net.sourceforge.JDash.skin.XMLSkin
Class XMLGaugePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  net.sourceforge.JDash.gui.AbstractGaugePanel
                      net.sourceforge.JDash.skin.XMLSkin.XMLGaugePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class XMLGaugePanel
extends AbstractGaugePanel

A simple extension to a JPanel. This simply draws the skin background in place. Like most JPanels, you can add swing components to it's main area. But, you MUST add a component with an original outter rectangle size value. do not just call add(comp). you MUST use add(comp, Rectangle);

See Also:
Serialized Form
